meanings.definition: Remaining after the rest has been used or dealt with.
meanings.sent2: I saved some leftover money for later.
meanings.sent3: The leftover cake looked sad all alone.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a leftover sadness from the past.
meanings.sent5: The image of the leftover food made my stomach growl.

meanings.definition: Something that remains unused or unconsumed.
meanings.sent1: He ate the leftover without asking.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant gave us the leftover to take home.
meanings.sent3: The leftover in the fridge started a party.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a leftover in a world of new things.
meanings.sent5: The leftover of the day was the highlight of the meal.
